original: Eklundh, Bengt Hjalmar Albert, hy-poteksombudsman. Kärrnäs, Pjätteryd, f. 25/7/82 i Lund av akademiräntmäst. Robert E. o. Zelima E. G. 09 m. Carola Henning. Barn: Ingrid f. 10, Carin 13, Bengt 15, Robert 17, Lennart 17, d. 46. — Stud:ex. 00, ex. t. rättegångsverken 05. Adv:verks. 08-10, aman. v. Lunds räntekamm. o. kansli 09-18, samtid, i Skånska hypoteksfören. i Lund, v. ombudsman där 18-33, om- budsman o. chef 33’-42. Äv. ombudsm. i Skand. banken i Lund 10-20, i Skå-ne-Hallands: Hageiförs :bol. 19-33. LänS’Styr. omb. i tax:nd 11-20, försäk-r :insp. omb. h. Skånska Brandförsäk-r iinrättn. 17-45, sekr. i domkyrkorådet 19-35. Skr.: Folk på vägen (18), På jakt (26), Svensk^ jakt (29), Med bössa o. utan (32), Djur o. männiiskor (35), I det vildas .spår (44), Så mötte jiag dem (46). RVO, Sv. Tägarförb. hed :tG 27, jub :med. 30.
translated: Eklundh, Bengt Hjalmar Albert, mortgage representative. Born on July 25th, 1882, in Lund, to Academy Rentmaster Robert E. and Zelima E. G. Married to Carola Henning in 1909. Their children were Ingrid, born in 1910, Carin in 1913, Bengt in 1915, and Robert and Lennart, both born in 1917, with Lennart passing away in 1946. Bengt passed the studentexamen in 1900 and the examination for the court in 1905. He worked as an assistant lawyer from 1908 to 1910 and as a clerk at Lund's rent chamber and office from 1909 to 1918, concurrently with his work at Skånska hypoteksfören. in Lund, where he became a representative in 1918. He was also a representative in Skandinaviska Enskilda Banken in Lund from 1910 to 1920, and in Skåne-Hallands: Hageiförs: bol. from 1919 to 1933. He was also appointed as a tax committee representative from 1911 to 1920, and as an insurance inspector for Skånska Brandförsäkr. inrättn. from 1917 to 1945, as well as being the secretary of the cathedral council from 1919 to 1935. Bengt wrote several books, including "Folk på vägen" (18), "På jakt" (26), "Svensk jakt" (29), "Med bössa o. utan" (32), "Djur o. människor" (35), "I det vildas spår" (44), and "Så mötte jag dem" (46). He was awarded the RVO and received the Sv. Tägarförb. hed:tG in 1927 and jub :med. in 1930.
